name: Local Community
description: What will living in a local community mean in 50 years?

actions.template: Ursula tended her hydroponic garden. Carrie, her high-tech bag, humming by her side. Ursula was happy that she was still active at her age. Carrie helped her to harvest and carry all the heavy stuff. Self-sufficient domes bloomed around them, a vibrant community thrived within their shared living space. It was a warm winter day in 2074.
